supersnek

Class ScoreBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • supersnek.ObjectController<Snake>
      • supersnek.ScoreBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Tickable

    public class ScoreBoard
extends ObjectController<Snake>
    scoreboard for the game, tracks snake's ammo and length
    Author:
    Noah Overcash (smileytechguy@smileytechguy.com)
